Question: Shenzhen Iproda Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
IProda Technology

Product: Consumer Electronics

- Professional ODM and OEM of consumer electronics including Tablets, Notebooks, All-in-one, Mini PCs, advertisement players, POS, AI speakers, smart watches, smartphone, TWS earphone, etc.
- ISO14001, ISO9001 & BSCI certified with 600 experienced employees, class 100,000 Clean Room with Air Shower, 7 assembly lines, 2 packaging lines & a reliability lab capable of producing 300,000pcs of smart devices per month.
- Strong and experienced R&D team, customization projects for customers all over the world, steady vendor of world-famous brand Haier, official SI of Intel, and awarded the prize of National High-tech Enterprise by the government.
Summary_cn:
IProda Technology（艾普达科技）

产品：消费电子产品

- 专业提供消费电子产品的ODM和OEM服务，包括平板电脑、笔记本电脑、一体机、迷你电脑、广告播放器、POS机、AI音箱、智能手表、智能手机、TWS耳机等。
- ISO14001、ISO9001和BSCI认证，拥有600名经验丰富的员工，配备净化级别为100,000的洁净室和空气淋浴室，拥有7条装配线、2条包装线和一个可月产30万部智能设备的可靠性实验室。
- 实力雄厚且经验丰富的研发团队，为全球客户提供定制项目，是世界知名品牌海尔稳定供应商，是英特尔的官方SI合作伙伴，并荣获中国政府颁发的国家高新技术企业奖。
